experience.title: Actuarial Analyst
experience.description: Performs valuation of liabilities for life insurance products using Prophet and MG-ALFA software. Assists in the preparation of quarterly financial reports and statutory filings. Collaborates with senior actuaries to refine mortality assumptions and interest rate models, ensuring compliance with ASOP standards.

experience.title: Actuarial Intern
experience.description: Streamlined data processing workflows by developing VBA macros and SQL queries for large-scale claims databases. Conducted loss development analysis for personal auto lines and supported the pricing team in evaluating the impact of state-specific rate changes.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
